@mondo136: Please back up your claim before you post.

First it's not a fake, dumb ass. Second it's just compressed at a higher rate, presumably ( It's a p2p release so it's not very clear which scene rules the obey :) ). 3rd the .dvd file has the .iso name wrong... The .iso is named ungodly-hr.iso, but the .dvd file says ungodly-hr2.iso. So to burn it, just rename one of the two, so they are the same.

PS. A Xbox game is never full 7.8gb, as shown after unrarring.... If you use other compression rate, other that "Storage" ( WinRar ) the resulted size will shrink, as it nears the real size of the game.
